Use a freight forwarder to help you import and export goods for your business.
$!

You can find a freight forwarder using the [British International Freight Association (BIFA) directory.](http://www.bifa.org/content/Member.aspx "British International Freight Association (BIFA) directory"){:rel="external"}

##Help you can get

A freight forwarder can help you with:

- packaging and labelling
- customs paperwork	
- paying any taxes or duties owed
- insurance
- managing your inventory

Some freight forwarders specialise in certain goods, eg live animals, food, or dangerous and hazardous materials.
overview: Help with importing and exporting - customs, documents, paperwork, insurance, logistics
title: Freight forwarders for international shipping
